name: star-piece
short_effect: Platinum: Trade for one of each color Shard. Black and White: Trade for PP Up. Sell for 4900 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 9800 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A small shard of a beautiful gem that demonstrates a distinctly red sparkle. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A small shard of a beautiful gem that demonstrates a distinctly red sparkle. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A small shard of a beautiful gem that gives off a distinctly red sparkle. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
